lastMessageTimeFilterConfig.name: LastMessageTime
lastMessageTimeFilterConfig.reason: Please wait for 2 seconds before sending the next message.

sameMessageFilterConfig.name: SameMessage
sameMessageFilterConfig.reason: The message is the same as the previous one.

maxUpperCaseFilterConfig.reason: The number of uppercase letters in the message exceeds the limit.

tooManyViolationsFilterConfig.reason: You have violated the filter too many times.

similarityFilterConfig.name: Similarity
similarityFilterConfig.reason: The message is too similar to the previous one.
